iebaker.neon.world

Class Viewport

  • java.lang.Object
    • iebaker.neon.slice.SliceElement
      • iebaker.neon.core.Widget
        • iebaker.neon.world.Viewport

  • public class Viewport
extends Widget
    Viewport is a class which represents a view into a CellWorld which is pannable and zoomable. If everything works properly, and I don't lose my mind by the end of this project, it should have a nice deceleration for the panning mode so that motion is always smooth.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Viewport

        public Viewport(Application a,
        Screen s,
        java.lang.String id,
        CellWorld cw)
        Constructor. Essentially identical to the Widget constructor, except it takes a CellWorld object which will be rendered through the viewport.
        Parameters:
        a - The parent application
        s - The parent screen
        id - The WidgetID of this viewport
        cw - A CellWorld to be visualized by this viewport
